description:
Izuna uses her Blood Destruction ability, which lets her temporarily gain abilities beyond the laws of physics.  All Sora and Shiro can do is run.  Her astonishing physical abilities allow her to dodge attacks that should be undodgable.  At last, her gun is pointed at Sora and Shiro.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 収束法[ルール・ナンバー・10]
